entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022
